title: What song perfectly applies to your life? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a lot since there are many aspects of my life (i’m not gonna say all of them cuz i literally have 2k in my phone lmao) anyway, this songs remind me of aspects of my life : Just my everyday vibe : La c’est die - Ridsa - french song.  Rock - I am rock ( I am a badass with a don’t fuck me attitude and i listen to this song alot while weight lifting)  Do ya Thang T.I. Presents The P$C -  Soprano - Fresh prince (French song)  LAKEY INSPIRED - Overjoyed  Stereo Love-Instrumental , it’s kinda everyday vibe.  Ampyx - Ember:  Same here : NCS blank  Eastside boys - Get low.  Same here : black beatles  Booba : Rdin’ (FR)  Summer feelings, Charlie puth (nightcore version)  Again same : Sublab cosmica  Don’t know the title but basically, I’m here with you , forget about the past vibe. This is a japanese song i discovered in Hunter x hunter the lyrics are really good :  Anime again, Escanor’s theme “Sunshine” you can literally mesure my pride by this song although there are no lyrics.  Neffex - best of me : life goals.  Life goals again : Puscifer "Momma Sed"  Hisoka’s theme : the way i’m seen around people (cool guy of the school-no city)  And also same thing : Dynamite MC : after party.  Now when i had a crush : Risa- Amour secret , this song defines 2016 for me.  Ridsa validé. same french singer.  M.pokora : Le monde (french singer aswell, yeah i’m a french ethnic guy as if it wasn’t obvious lmao also french is synonym with love)  G-Eazy & Halsey - Him & I  Hooked- why don’t we.  Benny Benassi ft. Gary Go - Cinema :  I can take your pain away ,N3WPORT  Daze inn - Carlie Hanson  Jonas Blue, MAX - Naked  Los- one and only.  9000 miles : (i also like to use this one while running for 8 hours straight)  When someone finally manages to charm me : Mpokora again - tombé  Trevor Daniel - For You  When Bae is sad , Mashmello be kind but nightcore version :  Rihanna - This is what you came for  Little mix - Touch  Like it is Kygo, Zara :  Blondie : Long time  Big time rush - music sounds better with you.  Francis cabrel - Je l’aime a mourire (FR)  Francis again - Je t’aimais je t’aime et je t’aimerai (FR)  Tate Mcrae : Vicious  How someone feels when they fight me in a boxing match (full contact fighter and yes I AM A FREAKING TANK ) : HxH : Hegemony Of The Food Chain  One Piece Soundtrack - Karakuri Castle, Transform  Sasuken kaishi.  Songs that remind me of my childhood self : Dbgt opening instrumental :  One piece ending 1 instumental :  To finish it off : a song that defines my best friend’s personality : Sasuke’s theme.

Silent Scream I'm caught up in your expectationsYou're trying to make me live your dreamBut I'm causing you so much frustrationAnd you only want the best for meYou wanted me to show more interestsTo always keep a big bright smileBe that pinky little perfect princessBut I'm not that type of childAnd this storm is rising inside of meDon't you feel that our whole worlds collide?It's getting harder to breatheIt hurts deep insideJust let me beWho I amIt's what you really need to understandAnd I hope so hard for the pain to go awayAnd it's torturing meBut I can't break freeSo I cry and cry but just won't get it outThe Silent ScreamTell me why you're putting pressure on meAnd everyday you 'cause me harmThat's the reason why I feel so lonelyEven though you hold me in your armsWanna put me in a box of glitterBut I'm just trying to get right outAnd now you're feeling so so bitterBecause I've let you downAnd this storm is rising inside of meDon't you feel that our whole worlds collide?It's getting harder to breatheIt hurts deep insideJust let me beWho I amIt's what you really need to understandAnd I hope so hard for the pain to go awayAnd it's torturing meBut I can't break freeSo I cry and cry but just won't get it outThe Silent ScreamCan't you see how I cry for help'Cause you should love me just for being myselfI'll drown in an oceanOf pain and emotionIf you don't save me right awayJust let me beWho I amIt's what you really need to understandAnd I hope so hard for the pain to go awayAnd it's torturing meBut I can't break freeSo I cry and cry but just won't get it outThe Silent Scream, my Silent Scream It’s like everyone wants me to someone I’m not
